body_html:
.... but...
This command you report using and having an issue with

virtualenv --system-site-packages -p python3 ~/tensorflow

has nothing to do with TensorFlow. Why are you reporting this issue here?
body_text:
.... but...
This command you report using and having an issue with
virtualenv --system-site-packages -p python3 ~/tensorflow

has nothing to do with TensorFlow. Why are you reporting this issue here?
body:
.... but...
This command you report using and having an issue with
```
virtualenv --system-site-packages -p python3 ~/tensorflow
```
has **nothing** to do with TensorFlow. Why are you reporting this issue here?
